content: worked with a fine weight yarn this cute spiral crochet hat is perfect for spring and fall if you love the look of knit and the ease of crochet the pinwheel beanie might be just the perfect project for you don t miss a thing subscribe to my free newsletter 1 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 2 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 3 join our community of crocheters and have fun 1 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 2 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 3 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/
